snippet: A powerful bomb exploded Monday during rush hour along a main road in the southern Philippine city of Cotabato, killing at least 6 people and wounding more than 30 others.
abstract: Bomb explodes during rush hour on main road of Cotabato, Philippines, killing at least 8 people and wounding more than 30 others.
lead_paragraph: A powerful bomb exploded Monday during rush hour along a main road in the southern Philippine city of Cotabato, killing at least 6 people and wounding more than 30 others.

headline.main: The Philippines: Deadly Bombing Rocks Southern City
headline.print_headline: The Philippines: Deadly Bombing Rocks Southern City
